install.name: Content - Sexy Bookmarks
install.author: Alex Hoentschel
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 - 2009 Alex Hoentschel. All rights reserved.
install.description: Adds sexy styled social bookmarks menu to your Joomla articles or frontpage. This plugin is based on the Sexy Bookmarks Wordpress Plugin from Josh Jones

param.name: frontpage
param.label: Display Sexy Bookmarks on Frontpage
param.description: Sexy Bookmarks should appear at your Frontpage

param.name: article
param.label: Display Sexy Bookmarks on article pages
param.description: Sexy Bookmarks should appear on all single articles

param.name: blog
param.label: Display Sexy Bookmarks on blog layout pages
param.description: Sexy Bookmarks should appear on all blog layout pages

param.name: manual
param.label: Display only if manually defined
param.description: Sexy Bookmarks should ONLY appear on articles with manually inserted bookmark tag. Add {sexybookmark} including brackets to your content. This will deactivated frontpage, blog and article settings above

param.name: include_cat
param.label: Categories
param.description: Comma separated list of categories where the menu should appear. Leave it blank for all categories

param.name: add_css
param.label: Add Default CSS File
param.description: Adds the default CSS File to the header

param.name: add_nofollow
param.label: Add no-follow
param.description: Adds the no-follow tag to the links

param.name: open_in_newwindow
param.label: Open links in new window?
param.description: Adds the _blank attribute to the links
